createslackchannelconfiguration.name: CreateSlackChannelConfiguration
createslackchannelconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a Slack channel configuration for your account

deleteaccountalias.name: DeleteAccountAlias
deleteaccountalias.description: Grants permission to delete an alias from your account

deleteslackchannelconfiguration.name: DeleteSlackChannelConfiguration
deleteslackchannelconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a Slack channel configuration from your account

deleteslackworkspaceconfiguration.name: DeleteSlackWorkspaceConfiguration
deleteslackworkspaceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a Slack workspace configuration from your account

describeslackchannels.name: DescribeSlackChannels
describeslackchannels.description: Grants permission to list all public Slack channels in a workspace that have invited the AWS Support App

getaccountalias.name: GetAccountAlias
getaccountalias.description: Grants permission to get the alias for your account

getslackoauthparameters.name: GetSlackOauthParameters
getslackoauthparameters.description: Grants permission to get parameters for the Slack OAuth code, which the AWS Support App uses to authorize the workspace

listslackchannelconfigurations.name: ListSlackChannelConfigurations
listslackchannelconfigurations.description: Grants permission to list all Slack channel configurations for your account

listslackworkspaceconfigurations.name: ListSlackWorkspaceConfigurations
listslackworkspaceconfigurations.description: Grants permission to list all Slack workspace configurations for your account

putaccountalias.name: PutAccountAlias
putaccountalias.description: Grants permission to create or update an alias for your account

redeemslackoauthcode.name: RedeemSlackOauthCode
redeemslackoauthcode.description: Grants permission to redeem the Slack OAuth code, which the AWS Support App uses to authorize the workspace

registerslackworkspacefororganization.name: RegisterSlackWorkspaceForOrganization
registerslackworkspacefororganization.description: Grants permission to register a Slack workspace for an AWS account that is part of an organization

updateslackchannelconfiguration.name: UpdateSlackChannelConfiguration
updateslackchannelconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update a Slack channel configuration for your account
